text: Guys, it is possible to add custom actions inside the `Contacts` page? Like a single button that calls an API, or open an Iframe?
Or even add a new option here

Quick Question :slightly_smiling_face:
Are Custom CRM Cards an Enterprise feature, or does it work also in Professional?

Hello. I try to create a Custom Card with HubDB content. I’m having a Pro Bundle Account and a Dev Account. When I try to connect over “hs init”, I get a “The post in account XXX was forbidden”. I can not really enroll into the beta as it seems as I’m having a Pro Account and not Enterprise. But here I could be wrong. When I try to “init” the App to the Dev Account I will get that the “Personal CMS Access Key” doesnt exist.
Can anyone give me a hint how I can set up a Custom Card in this environment? :)
Are you talking about crm development cards? or just normal crm cards?
crm development cards are currently only available for enterprise accounts but normal cards are available for all accounts
